short_description: Fastpath function to return parameters and target columns to be used by TD_NonLinearCombineTransform function for generating a new feature.
long_description: Fastpath function to return parameters and target columns to be used by TD_NonLinearCombineTransform function for generating a new feature.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_NonLinearCombineFit can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_NonLinearCombineFit can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to be used for the non linear combination.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to be used for the non linear combination.

argument_clauses.name: Formula
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the formula to be used.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the formula to be used.

argument_clauses.name: ResultColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the new feature column.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the new feature column.
